content:
That's the spirit! I'm thrilled to see you're excited to try out teff flour and make injera from scratch. Remember, practice makes perfect, so don't be discouraged if your first attempts don't turn out exactly as expected. Keep experimenting, and you'll soon become a pro at making injera and other teff-based dishes.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm always here to help. Share your experiences, and I'd love to hear about your progress and offer any additional tips or advice.

Good luck, and happy cooking!
